preface.simpara: This story chronicles the inexplicable hazards and vicious beasts a team must surmount and vanquish on the journey to finding their documentation’s true power.

chapter.title: A City Under Siege
chapter.simpara: This journey begins one late Monday afternoon at Devoxx. Our team desperately needs coffee, but none of us dare open the theater doors. We hear:

blockquote.simpara: “Leave and face code dismemberment and certain death.”

chapter.simpara: During the first conference workshop, a script-addicted warlock released a plague of Wolpertingers.
You may not be familiar with these ravenous beasts, but, trust us, they’ll eat your shorts and suck the loops from your code.

Since then, we’d been searching for the security crew’s defensive operations manual. But we couldn’t find it, and those DefOps werewolves still hadn’t returned from their trust building retreat at
beer Bier Central. They’d left last night. Either they’d eaten each other, or they’d fallen victim to the Wolpertingers roaming the city streets. See .
